amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to clarify that special districts are eligible to participate in the wildfire-related programs authorized under the Healthy Forests Restoration Act of 2003. Also, the amendment clarifies that special districts are eligible to participate in the biochar research and development program established in Sec.301 of H.R.8790. Expands the Good Neighbor Authority to special districts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
